# MusicTokenRequestError.permissionDenied

**Case**

An error that occurs when the user doesn’t consent for the current app to access their Apple Music data.

## Declaration

```swift
case permissionDenied
```

## Discussion

Apps using MusicKit need to request prior informed consent from the user to access their Apple Music data by calling [doc://com.apple.MusicKit/documentation/MusicKit/MusicAuthorization/request()] at the appropriate point in the app flow, right before needing to use other APIs from MusicKit.
title: MusicTokenRequestError.permissionDenied
